name: PowerShell Environment
observations: User is working in Windows PowerShell v5.1 environment
Terminal commands should use PowerShell syntax, not bash/cmd
Use semicolon (;) for joining commands on single line when needed
File paths use backslashes and Windows-style paths
Commands like 'curl' work in PowerShell but may need different syntax
Use proper PowerShell cmdlets when available instead of Unix-style commands
Cart API endpoints need to include project_id parameter for multi-tenant isolation
Cart functionality should integrate with user authentication context instead of hardcoded user ID
Shopping cart should respect project-level boundaries like inventory system
